column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=What do you think happens when we die ?
#Text=I was raised as a Catholic , and while I did n't marry within the church , my wife is also Catholic .

#Text=It does n't necessarily hold that there dies within you all that you believe when you were shaped by the process of being born Catholic , so I do believe -- I comfort myself , I comfort myself -- with the notion of an eternal life .
#Text=But as George Eliot said in that great novel you probably read , religion is a fear of the hereafter .
#Text=Religion is a fear of the hereafter .
#Text=That 's what it is .
#Text=It provides you a conviction or belief that there is something there in the hereafter , or else you wo n't have any long view .
#Text=Religion gives you a long view that what you do on Earth is going to shape your destiny in heaven .
#Text=That 's comforting .
#Text=Do you have religion ?
#Text=To the degree I stated I do , but to the degree that the Pope ...
#Text=I do n't go to church , and I do n't abide by anything the church preaches .
#Text=Do you pray ?
#Text=Privately I do , sometimes , yes , I do .
#Text=In certain moments more than others ?
#Text=In moments when I feel that I 'm out of control .
#Text=That I can not affect the result .
#Text=When do you feel out of control ?
#Text=When I fear I am going to die .
#Text=I remember praying on an airplane between Denver and Santa Fe .
#Text=It was a small commuter flight .

#Text=The co-pilot came back and said we are going to have turn back because our left landing gear will not go down , and we are going to have to dump gas over the dessert because we need to go back to Denver , because it is better equipped as an airport to deal with this crash landing we need to have .
#Text=More foam and the fire department is bigger .
#Text=We had twenty minutes before our crash landing .
#Text=During that time I prayed .
#Text=I wrote a letter to my wife .
#Text=I was just about 50 .
#Text=I wrote a letter to my wife and daughters and prayed and thought , " This is it . "
#Text=What did the letter say ?
#Text=How much I loved them .
#Text=How sorry I was I did n't have more time .
#Text=How happy I was with the time I had .
#Text=How lucky we were , and how sad I was that I was n't going to be back .
#Text=I feared that the letter was going to burn with me .
#Text=It was ridiculous to be writing a letter , but I did .
#Text=What a fucking place for the end of me , Denver airport !
#Text=So that was fear .
#Text=Fear of the hereafter ?
#Text=Religion and prayers .
